    • Uses of Popup in javax.swing

      Subclasses of Popup in javax.swing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  PopupFactory.ContainerPopup
      ContainerPopup consolidates the common code used in the light/medium weight implementations of Popup.
      private static class  PopupFactory.HeadlessPopup
      Popup implementation that is used in headless environment.
      private static class  PopupFactory.HeavyWeightPopup
      Popup implementation that uses a Window as the popup.
      private static class  PopupFactory.LightWeightPopup
      Popup implementation that uses a JPanel as the popup.
      private static class  PopupFactory.MediumWeightPopup
      Popup implementation that uses a Panel as the popup.
      Fields in javax.swing declared as Popup 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Popup JPopupMenu.popup 
      (package private) Popup ToolTipManager.tipWindow

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a headless popup

      private Popup PopupFactory.getHeavyWeightPopup(Component owner, Component contents, int ownerX, int ownerY)
      Creates a heavy weight popup.
      (package private) static Popup PopupFactory.HeavyWeightPopup.getHeavyWeightPopup(Component owner, Component contents, int ownerX, int ownerY)
      Returns either a new or recycled Popup containing the specified children.
      private Popup PopupFactory.getLightWeightPopup(Component owner, Component contents, int ownerX, int ownerY)
      Creates a light weight popup.

      Returns a light weight Popup implementation.

      Creates a medium weight popup.
      (package private) static Popup PopupFactory.MediumWeightPopup.getMediumWeightPopup(Component owner, Component contents, int ownerX, int ownerY)
      Returns a medium weight Popup implementation.
      Popup PopupFactory.getPopup(Component owner, Component contents, int x, int y)
      Creates a Popup for the Component owner containing the Component contents.
      private Popup PopupFactory.getPopup(Component owner, Component contents, int ownerX, int ownerY, int popupType)
      Obtains the appropriate Popup based on popupType.
